name: Last Strike (Kinda Good Games)
description:
A Game with okay humor, randomly generated dungeons, criminal rocks and most importantly, a new type of Main Menu. Intrested? Then give it a shot!

You fight in randomly generated Dungeons and try find out about the secrets of the key gate. While that you get threatened by many kinds of enemies like cubes, cubes but in cooler, rocks, ghosts and more! After every Dungeon you get rewards, which make you stronger, but beware that the enemies get stronger too!

As of right now, the game will probaly get a few to no updates, as this is my entry to the "GamesTalente" competition.

if you wish to talk to me you can do it either on my discord server or in the comments, I will try to respond asap

https://discord.gg/BEuYsgCW

The Games Graphics are a bit messed up if not on Fullscreen Mode. Please use the button with the arrows to enter Fullscreen Mode.

if you have any concerns about anything you can contact me under: realkindagoodgames@gmail.com
